Type IExpressionRewriter

Namespace Machine.Fakes.Sdk

Rewriter abstractio that is used by Machine.Fakes in order to transform the inline constaint format used by Machine.Fakes into the specific formats used by the different mock frameworks.

Methods

  • Rewrite

Public instance methods

Expression Rewrite(Expression expr)

Rewrites the expression tree and replaces all occurences of Machine.Fakes specific inline constaints with the equivalents of a specific mock framework.
Parameters
Expression expr

Specifies the input expression.

Return
Expression

Returns the target expression in the format of the relevant mock framework.

Based on v0.2.3.0 of Machine.Fakes (650da0)
